content: cozy by the fire cowl is a luxurious möbius-shaped accessory designed to wrap you in warmth on chilly evenings worked seamlessly in the round with soft worsted-weight yarn the möbius structure allows the cowl to drape beautifully with a gentle natural spiral simple yet elegant the pattern combines easy-to-memorize slip stitches with simple stockinette stitches making it a perfect choice for adventurous beginners generous in circumference and height the cowl sits softly against the skin perfect for layering under coats or lounging indoors choose rich hearth-inspired colors like deep burgundy warm amber or smoky charcoal to enhance its inviting to enhance its cozy by the fire mood **materials ** * main color 2 skeins isager soft color e4s worsted weight #4 100g/273yds totaling 546 yds * contrasting color 1 skein juniper moon fairy floss color 1003 pixie super bulky weight #6 100g/328yds totaling 328yds * us 10 5/ 6 5mm circular knitting needles 24 inch
